p: Converts a basic Markdown file into a CSV representation

usage: md-to-csv.py [-h] [-o OUTPUT] [-v] input

positional arguments:
  input                 markdown file to convert

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  -o OUTPUT, --output OUTPUT
                        name of output file, if unset it converts file.md to out-<ISO 8601>.csv
  -v, --verbose         increase output verbosity

Convert a Markdown file to a CSV file named
out.YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.csv:

Convert a Markdown file to a named CSV with verbose logging
enabled:
